devdoc.author: RageTrade
devdoc.details: junior vault delegates calls to this library for logic

params.optimalBorrow: optimal token borrow to completely hedge sGlp
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns.repayDebt: true then reduce token hedge, false then increase token hedge
returns.tokenAmount: amount of tokens to be swapped
returns.usdcAmount: minimum/maximum amount of usdc basis swap direction

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns.borrowValue: value of the given token amounts

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns.currentBtcBorrow: amount of btc currently borrowed from AAVE
returns.currentEthBorrow: amount of eth currently borrowed from AAVE

params.maximize: true to get maximum price and false to get minimum
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

params.maximize: true to get maximum price and false to get minimum
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

params.asset: address of asset to check liquidation threshold for
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

params.glpDeposited: amount of glp for which optimal borrow needs to be calculated
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns.optimalBtcBorrow: optimal amount of btc borrowed from AAVE
returns.optimalEthBorrow: optimal amount of eth borrowed from AAVE

params.availableBorrowAmount: available borrow amount from senior vault
params.state: set of all state variables of vault
params.usdcLiquidationThreshold: the usdc liquidation threshold on AAVE

returns.optimalBtcBorrow: optimal amount of btc borrowed from AAVE
returns.optimalEthBorrow: optimal amount of eth borrowed from AAVE

params.state: set of all state variables of vault
params.token: the token for which price is expected

params.state: set of all state variables of vault
params.token: the token for which price is expected

params.glpDeposited: amount of glp for which underlying token amount is being calculated
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: amount of tokens of the supplied address underlying the given amount of glp

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: true if the rebalance is valid basis diffeence (current and optimal) threshold

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: true if the rebalance is valid basis AAVE health factor

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: true if the rebalance is valid basis time threshold

params.optimalBorrow: optimal borrow amount basis glp deposits
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: true if the difference is below allowed threshold else false

params.currentBtcBorrow: current btc amount borrowed from AAVE
params.currentEthBorrow: current eth amount borrowed from AAVE
params.optimalBtcBorrow: optimal btc amount to hedge sGLP btc underlying completely
params.optimalEthBorrow: optimal eth amount to hedge sGLP btc underlying completely
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

rebalanceHedge(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.S.details: to be called after settle profits only (since vaultMarketValue if after settlement of profits)

params.currentBtcBorrow: The amount of USDC collateral token deposited to LB Protocol
params.currentEthBorrow: The market value of ETH/BTC part in sGLP
params.glpDeposited: amount of glp deposited into the vault
params.isPartialAllowed: true if partial hedge is allowed
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns.isPartialHedge: true if partial hedge is executed

params.borrowValue: value of the borrowed assets(ETH + BTC) from AAVE in USDC
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

receiveFlashLoan(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.details: only allows balancer vault to call thisonly runs when _hasFlashloaned is set to true (prevents someone else from initiating flashloan to vault)

params.amounts: amounts of token flashloans in same order
params.feeAmounts: amounts of fee/premium charged for flashloan
params.userData: data passed to balancer for flashloan (includes token amounts, token usdc value and swap direction)

params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: total asset amount (glp + usdc (in glp terms))

params.maximize: true for maximizing the total assets value and false to minimize
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: total asset amount (glp + usdc (in glp terms))

params.maximize: true for maximizing the total assets value and false to minimize
params.state: set of all state variables of vault

returns._0: total asset amount (glp + usdc (in glp terms))

devdoc.title: Helper library for junior vault

flashloanAmounts(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.notice: returns the amount of flashloan for a given tokenif token amount needs to be increased then usdcAmount is minimum amountif token amount needs to be decreased then usdcAmount is maximum amount

getBorrowValue(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.S.notice: returns the borrow value for a given amount of tokens

getCurrentBorrows(DnGmxJuniorVaultManage.notice: returns the amount of current borrows of btc and eth token from AAVE

getGlpPrice(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.Stat.notice: returns the price of glp token

getGlpPriceInUsdc(DnGmxJuniorVaultManage.notice: returns the price of glp token in usdc

getLiquidationThreshold(DnGmxJuniorVault.notice: returns liquidation threshold of the selected asset's AAVE pool

getOptimalBorrows(DnGmxJuniorVaultManage.notice: returns optimal borrows for BTC and ETH respectively basis glpDeposited amount and stored pool amount

getOptimalCappedBorrows(DnGmxJuniorVault.notice: returns optimal borrows for BTC and ETH respectively basis available borrow amount

getTokenPrice(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.St.notice: returns the price of given token basis AAVE oracle

getTokenPriceInUsdc(DnGmxJuniorVaultMana.notice: returns the price of given token in USDC using AAVE oracle

getTokenReservesInGlp(DnGmxJuniorVaultMa.notice: returns token amount underlying glp amount deposited and stored pool amount

harvestFees(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.Stat.notice: stakes the rewards from the staked Glp and claims WETH to buy glpalso update protocolEsGmx fees which can be vested and claimeddivides the fees between senior and junior tranches based on senior tranche utilfor junior tranche weth is deposited to batching manager which handles conversion to sGLPfor senior tranche weth is converted into usdc and deposited on AAVE which increases the borrowed amount

isValidRebalanceDeviation(DnGmxJuniorVau.notice: returns if the rebalance is valid basis the difference between the current and optimal hedges of tokens(ETH/BTC)

isValidRebalanceHF(DnGmxJuniorVaultManag.notice: returns if the rebalance is valid basis health factor on AAVEreturns true if current health factor < threshold

isValidRebalanceTime(DnGmxJuniorVaultMan.notice: returns if the rebalance is valid basis last rebalance time and rebalanceTimeThreshold

isWithinAllowedDelta(DnGmxJuniorVaultMan.notice: returns token amount underlying glp amount deposited

rebalanceBorrow(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager..notice: rebalances the assets borrowed from AAVE to hedge ETH and BTC underlying the assets

rebalanceHedge(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.S.notice: rebalances btc and eth hedges according to underlying glp token weightsupdates the borrowed amount from senior tranche basis the target health factorif the amount of swap for a token > theshold then a partial hedge is taken and remaining is taken separatelyif the amount of swap for a token < threshold complete hedge is takenin case there is not enough money in senior tranche then relevant amount of glp is converted into usdc

rebalanceProfit(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager..notice: rebalances pnl on AAVE against the sGLP assets

receiveFlashLoan(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.notice: flashloan receiver for balance vaultreceives flashloaned tokens(WETH or WBTC or USDC) from balancer, swaps on uniswap and borrows/repays on AAVE

totalAssets(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.Stat.notice: returns the total assets deposited to the vault (in glp amount)
returns the total assets deposited to the vault (in glp amount)

totalGlp(DnGmxJuniorVaultManager.State s.notice: returns the total assets deposited to the vault (in glp amount)
